message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.SY

This paper primarily focuses on the security and privacy of the DNS system, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The use of Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) also suggests a focus on networking and internet technologies (cs.NI). The paper proposes a novel architecture for DNS-over-TLS, which involves the design and implementation of a DNS Recursive Resolver (RecRes), indicating a focus on software engineering (cs.SE) and distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the use of Remote Attestation to authenticate the RecRes suggests a focus on system security and trust (cs.SY).
